revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen}} '''A_PoisonShroom'''
(''no parameter'')
Randomly sets the calling state's duration to 128-638 tics (about 4-18 seconds). This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|ZPoisonShroom}} and derived classes.
